title: Buffalo National River: Trash Free Park
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Trash Free Park              Trash Free Park         Trash cans have been removed from many areas throughout the park. Be prepared to take your trash home for disposal and recycling. NPS Photo  Pack it in – Pack it out – Like many other national parkd, most of our trash collection is being eliminated. Visitors should be prepared to take their trash home for disposal and recycling. Help us keep the park from looking like the picture below.  Remember: Arkansas state law requires anyone floating the river with food and/or beverages to carry and secure a mesh litterbag. See our River Rules page for more information.       Trash bags torn open and trash strewn around by wildlife when not put in trash cans or taken home. NPS Photo
